Description: Fragment of oval handle from a Thasian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine, micaceous red-brown. Rectangular stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription and spear head symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Kleophon. Bon, A. and A., Les timbres amphoriques de Thasos (Paris 1957) 969. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 128, 7?
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0031)
